question: During which year did the wheat production is highest in the last decade?
explanation: The wheat production during the year 2019-20 is the highest in the lat decade. Production of wheat during 2019-20 is estimated at record 106.21 million tonne, which is higher by 2.61 million tonnes compared with wheat production during 2018-19 and is 11.60 million tonnes higher than the five-year average wheat production of 94.61 million tonnes.
